casebody.data:
BRYANT
v.
BRYANT 74P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 13, 2017 Nathaniel Bryant, for Bryant, Nathaniel. Joseph L. Gillespie, for Gillespie, Joseph L. Paul S. Messick, Jr., Attorney at Law, for Bryant, Charles Wilbur, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Plaintiff (Nathaniel Bryant) for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of March 2017."
